# leanspace_members (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "leanspace_members" "all" {
  filters {
    team_ids = var.team_ids
    statuses = ["ACTIVE"]
    ids      = []
    query    = ""
    page     = 0
    size     = 10
    sort     = ["name,asc"]
  }
}
```

- `filters` (Block List, Max: 1) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--filters))

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `last` (Boolean) True if this is the last page
- `number` (Number) Page number
- `number_of_elements` (Number) Number of elements fetched in this page

- `sort` (List of Object) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sort))
